attributes.action: issue a British Passport without further ado to Jade Victoria Jacobs Brooks
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please click on this link from the BBC News Website

http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/england/essex/7491310.stm

This young lady is being penalised for no good reason due to lazy bureaucrats both here and in Spain, please add your name to this petition so that Jade can live the full life that she deserves

rejection.details: Please direct your query to the Identity and Passport Service
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
